page.title: 09ST JUDE'S SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built in 1967 and was opened by the Bishop of Guildford in September 1976.It was re_organised as a middle school with additional facilities.As a voluntary aided middle school it represents a partnership between Surrey Education committee and the diocese of Guildford, and representatives of both are on the governing body.This also includes parents and local people with the Headteacher.the school has at present 187 children on roll. {SCHOOL TIMES Morning school 8.55_12.00 Afternoon school 1.15_3.30 Friday afternoon school closes at 3pm. Our set lessons are English,Maths,French,Assemblies, RE,history,Geography Science.Creative Arts are Music,Art,Craft,Domestic Science,computer studies.Sports are Games,P.E,Swimming.
